attributes.action: mothers of the fallen soldiers to visit Afganistan to lay wreaths at Camp Bastion memorial
attributes.additional_details: As we all know, the military forces are leaving Afganistan within the next few years. Australia and Canada have honoured the families of their fallen with a visit to Afganistan to place wreaths and attend a memorial service, WE, the mothers of the fallen from the UK wish to visit Camp Bastion before the pullout to pay our respects to our sons/daughters who fought for our queen and country and paid the ultimate sacrifice.
